summary: A quirky woman who spends her free time as a pilot has her purse stolen; when a mysterious man finds her wallet, they embark on a peculiar romance.
cast: Sabine Azéma|André Dussollier|Anne Consigny|Emmanuelle Devos|Mathieu Amalric|Michel Vuillermoz|Edouard Baer|Annie Cordy|Sara Forestier|Nicolas Duvauchelle|Vladimir Consigny|Dominique Rozan|Jean-Noël Brouté|Elric Covarel Garcia|Valéry Schatz|Stéfan Godin|Grégory Perrin|Roger Pierre|Paul Crauchet|Jean-Michel Ribes|Nathalie Kanoui|Adeline Ishiomin|Lisbeth Mornet-Arazi|Françoise Gillard|Magaly Godenaire|Rosine Cadoret|Vincent Rivard|Dorothée Blanck|Antonin Minéo|Emilie Jeauffroy|Patrick Mimoun|Isabelle Des Courtils|Candice Charles|Cédéric Deruytère|Lahcen Elmazouzi|Olivier Martinaud|Christine Renard
title: Las malas hierbas
